plot: This movie looks into a world of extortion, the underworld, gambling, bookies and match-fixing. It's based on the sport of cricket where players are forced to lose a match so that the underworld can benefit from it.
title: World Cupp 2011
plot_es: This movie looks into a world of extortion, the underworld, gambling, bookies and match-fixing. It's based on the sport of cricket where players are forced to lose a match so that the underworld can benefit from it.
plot_en: This movie looks into a world of extortion, the underworld, gambling, bookies and match-fixing. It's based on the sport of cricket where players are forced to lose a match so that the underworld can benefit from it.
